channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Flo are in Groby to create a celebration garden for Nanda and Riya, and their upcoming family wedding.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: With the clock ticking, the YMG? team try to catch up on lost time. Volunteers pitch in to get the project over the line, and along the way we meet several members of the community.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Rare Breed - A Farming Year
channel.desc: It's all system go on Ireland's farms as Spring arrives.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: In Wales and a London dungeon, Alice explores the world of BDSM. She also meets a Surrey couple where the dom 'owns' her sub's body 24/7. Contains scenes of a sexual nature.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
channel.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Jack
channel.desc: Enjoyable romp set in the 18th century about a highwayman's adventures in the North of England. Ken Loach - taking a break from social realism - directs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
channel.desc: Bill goes tree climbing in the Valley of the Giants and visits the best beach in the world. There's also tugboat racing.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are in Stone to create a fun family garden for Chloe and her daughters that also serves as a space to remember their late husband and dad Errol.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Charlie are in Leicester to create a safe garden for visually impaired Luigi and his wife Julie. It needs to be an easy-to-navigate space without any trip hazards.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives Mair and Dafydd the cash to buy, renovate and sell a historic chapel in Neath. But even with Simon's help and a generous budget, can they restore this local landmark and sell it on.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: The Many Tears animal rescue centre makeover continues. A tired kitchen gets a new lease of life and battered skateboard decks are turned into a bird feeder.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Farmers Country Showdown
channel.desc: The Akikis with their biodynamic fruit and veg - and cheesemaking Spierings - sell their produce at one of London's oldest farmers markets. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
channel.desc: Bill samples the laid-back red-dirt lifestyle, goes swimming with friendly whale sharks and visits the awesome Pink Lakes. There are also wild emus - and they're hungry.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives Mair and Dafydd the cash to buy, renovate and sell a historic chapel in Neath. But even with Simon's help and a generous budget, can they restore this local landmark and sell it on.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Alan and Val put their savings on the line for a high-tech boat to help them spend time with their family. But first they need to learn how to live on the water.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: A look behind the scenes at a dairy farm to see how they manage demand for milk. The sugar content of yoghurt. Sian looks into dairy alternatives.

channel.desc: Stories from men working in the music industry and the toll it has taken on their mental health and wellbeing. Featuring Rag'n'Bone Man, Dev IDLES and Geoff Barrow from Portishead.
